original: Moberg, Sigrid Eleonora, fil. mag., fru, Borås, f. 11/7/05 i Mariestad av Oiscar Ericson o. Selma Carli&son. G. 44 m. !lärov:adj. Ivar M. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 25, fil. mag. 31, provår i Gbg 40-41. Vik. ämneslär. i Skara, Skövde o. Gbg, e. adj. i Kalmar 37-38, Varberg 38-39, Mariestad 37 o. 39-40, Borås 41-44, e. o. ämneslär. v. Borås komm. flicksk. sed. 44, timlär. v. Borås h. a. 1. 45-46.
translated: Moberg, Sigrid Eleonora, Bachelor of Arts, Mrs., Borås, born on 11/7/1905 in Mariestad to Oiscar Ericson and Selma Carli&son. Married in 1944 to school teacher Ivar M. - completed high school exams in Gothenburg in 1925, graduated as a Bachelor of Arts in 1931, studied as a trainee teacher in Gothenburg from 1940-1941. Worked as a substitute subject teacher in Skara, Skövde, and Gothenburg, as an assistant teacher in Kalmar from 1937-1938, Varberg from 1938-1939, Mariestad in 1937 and 1939-1940, Borås from 1941-1944, and as an acting subject teacher at Borås municipal girls' school since 1944, and as an hourly teacher at Borås high school from 1945-1946.

education.credentialEarned: Graduated as a Bachelor of Arts
